Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
I hope you are well.
Please find the below arrangements for the LondonTraining Weekend on {!HR_Event__c.Event_Date__c}- {!HR_Event__c.Event_end_date__c}.
You are required to attend @ London South Bank University 103 Borough Rd, London, Greater London SE1 0AA
Times: 9-5pm; on all days. Ready to start promptly.
Please Bring:
Passport (and visa paperwork if relevant) OR combination of birth certificate plus National Insurance card or P45/ P60.
CRB (DBS) documents; We will be verifying CRB (DBS)documents so please bring your documents with you. If you donâ€™t have a valid CRB please bring with you identification we have earlier requested for your application.
Lunch and refreshments will be provided, please let us know if you require a vegetarian option, by Tuesday 25th June.
After you have attended training your contract will be sent shortly before the programme starts.
The training days are fully loaded with activities and information so please come prepared and full of energy. This is a great opportunity for you to really understand the summer programme and you might get a chance to meet some of the people you will be working with!
Warm Regards,
Sherry Kimball Staffing Associate The Challenge Network
